params.text:
Specify the module system

Describe how the module system works. This includes describing several
different things:

- interface files (.i)
- dependency files (.d)
- import expressions (and import paths)
- nested modules
- module declarations
- module paths (This.Is.A_module.Path)
- symbol visibility rules (where and when a function is visible)
- produced file structures (directory tree of a compiled module)

...and probably more.

The module system assumes that all Viua bytecode modules are linked
statically into the executable. All FFI modules are linked dynamically.

How to write interface and dependency files for FFI modules.

The Viua library path variable.
